attributes.action: Stop the threat of 60 to 80 tonne lorries on UK roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These lorries are up to 30 metres long, and weigh between 60 to 84 tonnes, the 60 tonner is 50% longer and over a third heavier than existing 44 tonne lorries,that already use our roads.They are totally unsuited to our roads on economic, environmental and especially saftey grounds.
We have enough lorries on our already congested roads, so use the alternative,put the traffic on the railways.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the threat of 60 to 80 tonne lorries on UK roads."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
